fontTheory.description: The typography system is designed to balance professionalism and readability, catering to the purpose of a resume.
fontTheory.readability: The combination of Georgia for body text provides readability and a touch of elegance, while Arial for headings ensures clarity and modern appeal.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The typographic hierarchy is established through contrasting font families and sizes, guiding the reader through the resume sections effectively.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Georgia and Arial complement each other by offering a balance of traditional and modern typographic styles, enhancing the overall visual appeal.
